attributes.action: increase the funding of policing by reducing the non-security funding of custody for offenders .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Deterrence of crime depends on the probability of being caught and the penalty for being so . Violent crime is unacceptably high and possibly rising and prisons are overflowing . Make prison life less acceptible by reducing non-security-related funding of custody . Divert the savings into policing .
